title: Thunderbird 115 message sort headings get corrupted when closed
content: In v115 I have selected View | Sort By | Grouped by sort. This displays my messages in date order with five age categories: Today, Yesterday, Last 7 days, Last 14 days, and Older. This works fine except when I close one of the groups by clicking on the "V" and changing it to ">". Th Correspondents and Date columns on the next group get populated from the first message of the closed group.
creator: terry30

title: Thunderbird email question
content: Before the latest update, as I open Thunderbird, each folder was set to the latest email in the list. Now it goes to a random email much earlier in time & I have to scroll down to get to the newest one. There's nowhere I can find in settings that addresses this. Thanks for your help!
creator: jh_cullom
